snippet: The latest in the fiscal negotiations. Plus, Barney Frank reflects on 32 years on the Hill, and Gov. Andrew Cuomo travels to Washington to request disaster aid.
abstract: The latest in the fiscal negotiations. Plus, Barney Frank reflects on 32 years on the Hill, and Gov. Andrew Cuomo travels to Washington to request disaster aid.

headline.main: TimesCast Politics: Obama Responds to Boehner's Counteroffer
